abstract: The big hedge fund laid off 150 employees, or about 10 percent of its work force, Institutional Investor reports.
snippet: The big hedge fund laid off 150 employees, or about 10 percent of its work force, Institutional Investor reports.
lead_paragraph: The big hedge fund D.E. Shaw & Company laid off 150 employees on Tuesday, or about 10 percent of its work force, Institutional Investor reports, citing unidentified people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: D. E. Shaw Layoffs Show Wall Street’s Pain Spreading
